## [Benefits of Studying at SARA]{.theme-white} {.scrollable background-image=images/lavender.png background-size=cover}

<br>

::: {.panel-tabset}

### For $12^{th}$ class

- We offer 45 days "Basics of Computer" course to improve the computer friendliness of students from semi-urban and rural regions.

- We offer regular English classes to improve writing, listening & speaking skills.

- We mentor students to get admission in prestigious national and international universities.

### For UG & PG

- Using [R programming language](https://www.r-project.org/) & [GitHub](https://github.com/), we offer various data science courses to teach data visualization, wrangling, statistics, and communication (like creating website using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/)).

- All UG & PG students can also attend our English & Computer courses to improve their basics.

- We can mentor UG & PG students to create an unique online profile to get scholarship for further studies or to get job in industry.

### For PhD Scholars & Faculty {.scrollable}

- Data science plays a crucial role in research across various fields due to its ability to analyze, interpret, and derive insights from large and complex data sets.

- We offer data science, research methodology, and statistics workshop and summer/winter school for PhD scholars and Faculty.

::: {.scrollable}

- Here are some key areas where data science is used in research: 
  - Healthcare and Medicine  
  - Social Sciences
  - Environmental Science
  - Business and Marketing
  - Engineering and Technology
  - Education
  - Astronomy and Astrophysics
  - Psychology and Neuroscience
  - Agriculture
  - Energy
  
:::  

:::
